__init__(self, transform=None, rz=0, ry=0, rx=0, scale=1, translation=array([[0...)
(Constructor)

source code 

Construct an affine transform.

A generic transformation matrix can be supplied, or a transform composed of rotation and scaling can be built.

Generating rotations using supplied Euler angles is performed from the perspective of a fixed camera viewing a rotating object, i.e. points rotate within a fixed reference frame. Rotations are applied in aerospace (ZYX) order.

Parameters:
  • transform - 3x3 linear transformation matrix.
  • rx - X rotation angle in radians.
  • ry - Y rotation angle in radians.
  • rz - Z rotation angle in radians.
  • scale - Scaling factor
  • translation - 3x1 translation vector.
Overrides: object.__init__
